body_html:
@tzuf My colleague @juliusshufan help me try to reproduce the problems on Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz whose performance is even worse than that on your machine. Unfortunately, it only costs 3min (not nearly 27 min) to print one log. I think it maybe caused by your environments. You can use command top to check the utilization of CPU. If the utilization of CPU is normal, provide the info which my colleague mentioned plz.

Btw, there is 8 cores(not 64 cores that you mentioned) on Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU X7560. OMP_NUM_THREADS=8 KMP_AFFINITY=scatter is a good chioce.

Btw, there is 8 cores(not 64 cores that you mentioned) on Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU X7560.   OMP_NUM_THREADS=8 KMP_AFFINITY=scatter is a good chioce.
body:
@tzuf My colleague @juliusshufan help me try to reproduce the problems on Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz whose performance is even worse than that on your machine. Unfortunately, it only costs 3min (not nearly 27 min) to print one log. I think it maybe caused by your environments. You can use command `top` to check the utilization of CPU.  If the utilization of CPU is normal, provide the info which my colleague mentioned plz.

Btw, there is 8 cores(not 64 cores that you mentioned) on Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU X7560.   `OMP_NUM_THREADS=8 KMP_AFFINITY=scatter` is a good chioce.
